Paragraph.Text: Uses Chlorine Canisters to make Plasma-Imbued Missiles have a damage-over-time effect of half the original damage over 30 seconds.
This machine requires hoppers holding at least 1 Chlorine Canister and Plasma-Imbued Missile to start the toxifying process.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Manufacturing Time: Power Required: Power Capacity: Max. Power Recharge Rate:
